articles.description: Kevin Sinfield pays tribute to the late Rob Burrow, calling his former Leeds Rhinos team-mate a "beacon of hope and inspiration".
articles.title: Rob Burrow dies: Kevin Sinfield tribute to friend and former Leeds team-mate

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe will join Real Madrid on a free transfer from Paris St-Germain when the La Liga transfer window opens on 1 July.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: France forward signs Real Madrid contract to join on free transfer

articles.description: Everton send a "get well soon" message to their former striker Kevin Campbell who is "very unwell" in hospital.
articles.title: Kevin Campbell: Ex-Everton and Arsenal striker 'very unwell' in hospital

articles.description: West Indies start their 2024 T20 World Cup campaign on home soil with a five-wicket victory over Papua New Guinea in Group C.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: West Indies beat Papua New Guinea by five wickets

articles.description: A champion on and off the field, Rob Burrow's determination, courage and humility ensures a legacy that stretches way beyond rugby league.
articles.title: Rob Burrow dies: Leeds rugby league great and MND campaigner

articles.description: Japan's Yuka Saso recovers from a three-shot deficit to became the youngest player to win two US Women's Open titles.
articles.title: US Women's Open: Yuka Saso storms home to win second major

articles.description: Wimbledon champion Carlos Alcaraz sweeps past Felix Auger-Aliassime to set up a French Open quarter-final against 2021 runner-up Stefanos Tsitsipas.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Carlos Alcaraz and Stefanos Tsitsipas reach men's quarter-finals

articles.description: Jose Mourinho is set to be named manager of Turkish Super Lig side Fenerbahce.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho: Portuguese set to be named manager of Turkish side Fenerbahce

articles.description: After Novak Djokovic clinched a French Open victory at 3am, fellow top players Coco Gauff and Iga Swiatek say late finishes must be stopped.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Novak Djokovic finishing at 3am in Paris is 'unhealthy', says Coco Gauff

articles.description: Antoine Dupont inspires France to a 19-5 win over Argentina in the final of the Sevens World Series in Madrid.
articles.title: Sevens World Series: Antoine Dupont leads France to Madrid triumph
